utter_faq/when_was_created.text: This Kupex was created at the beginning of September 2020.

utter_faq/shipping_duration.text: Standard Shipping usually takes about 5-7 business days. Premium Shipping takes about 2-3 business days.

utter_faq/payment_modes.text:
Payment mode we are supporting:
COD
Debit/Credit cards
EMI
Wallets.

utter_faq/track_order.text: You can track your product from accounts -> Orders. There you will find list of orders and select one of them to track.

utter_faq/change_account_info.text: You can change your email in accounts -> profile. Select edit and enter your new email .Click on save

utter_faq/return_policy.text: If you received a product and want to return it. You can return within 14 days of delivery date. Go to accounts -> Order select the order you need to return , Press Return button
